content.raw: The functionality of launch could either be in a separate repository or as a component inside ign-tools. I choose the latter because there is a significant amount of conceptual overlap with the existing code, I prefer to limit the number of repositories, and ign-tools has CI and release procedures in place.
content.html: The functionality of launch could either be in a separate repository or as a component inside ign-tools. I choose the latter because there is a significant amount of conceptual overlap with the existing code, I prefer to limit the number of repositories, and ign-tools has CI and release procedures in place.
